ComicInfo.Summary: Nicholas Dane survives a plane crash and being trapped 12 hours under water. After being rescued he finds that he now possesses different talents he "inherited" from each person on the plane. When he is targeted for death by Cardinal Montague for unknown reasons he goes on the run.
ComicInfo.Characters: Dennis Carrera (first appearance),Representative of "the balance" (lady with long yellow hair,Nicholas Dane (first appearance),dies),David Krause (first appearance),Agent Biederman (first appearance),Marcus Small (first appearance,Agent Bogart (first appearance),Cardinal Montague (first appearance),Barbara Clifford (first appearance),Robert "Cliff" Clifford (first appearance),(first appearance)
